WorkItem.Description:
I see that values for Mastery shown with RAWR are differed from ones shown in the character screen
in my case:
  head 157
  shoulder 120
  ring1 34 (single thing that was reforged)
  ring2 112
  waist 130
  no mastery enchants/gems/buffs
at all 553 - this number is shown by the character screen
RAWR shows 737

Comments.Message: I'm sorry! I didn't mentioned the trink with mastery proc. When I take it off - RAWR shows expected value 553. So it looks like the RAWR calculates some "average" value for such things - no problem at all :)
